name: Jane Smith
title: Principal Broker & Founder
bio: Jane founded Pinnacle Realty Group 12 years ago with a single mission: to build the most trusted real estate company in Westchester County. A lifelong resident of the area, Jane brings 18+ years of transaction experience, a deep network of local relationships, and an unwavering commitment to client outcomes. She has personally closed over $80M in transactions and mentors every agent on the team.

testimonials.text: Jane is the kind of broker you only find once in a lifetime. She negotiated $42K above our asking price and made the entire experience feel completely stress-free.
I've bought and sold three properties with Jane. Her market knowledge is unmatched in this area — she knew what our home would sell for before we even listed.
